== Task 4.4: Create the Interface using Coaches ==

 In this task, you will create the interface of the form that the patient will fill out when he/she arrives at the !Checkin Activity.

== Procedure ==

1. First of all, navigate to the Clinical-Pathway Diagram and press on the *Checkin* activity.

2. In the *Checkin* activity properties, press on *implementation* and then on *Select*.
   
   https://real-time-patient-flow-management.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/images/CheckinProperties.png

3. Choose *Check in service* from the list. Then, the _Check in service_ will show instead of the Default Human Service_.

   https://real-time-patient-flow-management.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/images/CheckinService.png

4. Now go to Checkin activity in the Diagram and double click on it.
